entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
